text:
Hi all! I'm working on creating a custom workflow action and have two questions:
1. The custom step looks pretty weird, as it includes the ID in both the `name` and the `content` of the step (see screenshot). I did specify the necessary labels in the POST request - has anyone also experienced this?
2. In the HubSpot docs, it stated that all (un)published workflow actions can be viewed in the developer portal. I've looked everywhere but I can't find it. Does anyone know where I can find these actions?
Thanks in advance!

Hey Steven, so workflow actions are kinda funny, they run through a i8 translation tool that takes forever to get the label to show up after first publishing the action. In a bit (up to 1 hour, I've seen) it will show the actual label
Are you checking in the developer test accounts? or just the dev account?

Thanks, Carter! I'm just now re-reading the docs and I see that they actually mention it. But appreciate the reply!

This action is in a workflow I have built in the developer test account. The second question was relating this part of the docs about workflow actions. But knowing that the labels will show up and I can make updates using the API, it's not that necessary anymore haha
of course, definitely let me know if you run into any other issues. Happy to help
<@U060JS28BNJ> So glad to hear about this! Thank you for resolving this issue!
Sorry I did not respond sooner. Vacation/Sickness really put me behind.
